    • 构造器详细资料

      • Mana

        public Mana(double initial_mana,
            double initial_mana_cap,
            double initial_mana_gained_per_second,
            double mana_pool_spell_initial_cost,
            double mana_pool_spell_cost_increase_per_use,
            double mana_pool_spell_cap_multiplier,
            double mana_pool_spell_mana_gained_multiplier,
            GameSet set)
        The constructer of mana object
        参数:
        initial_mana - The initial amount of mana.
        initial_mana_cap - The initial mana capacity.
        initial_mana_gained_per_second - The initial rate of mana gained per second.
        mana_pool_spell_initial_cost - The initial cost of the mana pool spell.
        mana_pool_spell_cost_increase_per_use - The cost increase per use of the mana pool spell.
        mana_pool_spell_cap_multiplier - The multiplier for the mana pool spell capacity.
        mana_pool_spell_mana_gained_multiplier - The multiplier for mana gained through the mana pool spell.
        set - The GameSet to which this mana object belongs.

      • manaspell

        public void manaspell()
        Spell mana, used to expand the mana cap

      • gainmama

        public void gainmama(double mana)
        Used to obtain mana obtained by killing monsters
        参数:
        mana - The amount of mana gained from defeating monsters

      • gianmanapersecond

        public void gianmanapersecond()
        Used to obtain mana per second

      • spendmana

        public void spendmana(double currenthp)
        Monsters being exiled and upgraded, building towers, and extending mana caps all require mana
        参数:
        currenthp - The amount of mana to be spent for the action.

      • setcurrentmana

        public void setcurrentmana(double mana)
        Set the current mana value for testing
